events.message: I want to request a refund for the jacket I ordered last week because it does not fit as expected and I no longer want to keep it.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's mention of refund and return.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund case for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your jacket. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been returned to our warehouse already?
My order number is 87456329. I sent the jacket back yesterday via courier and have the shipment receipt with me.
Thank you for the details. Once we receive and inspect the returned jacket, we will process your refund within 3-5 business days. We will notify you via email.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate your quick response and the clear explanation of the refund process.
We have received the jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited to your original payment method shortly.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was received without any issues. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since your refund is complete and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for choosing our service.
Please take a moment to complete a short customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
